name: Back to the Backrooms
description:
Back to the Backrooms  is an entry for the 48h GameJam+22/23 with the themes: “Back to the Future" and "Easy to Learn Hard to play” 

You control João,  who finds himself lost in a liminal space called backroom, where it's an endless yellow background with entities that want to kill him.  Luckily, he is armed and has a strange power that can travel time, but just for a while. Is it a dream or a panic fantasy? 


 

Inspired by backrooms, this Top Down game is about to kill enemies and be careful to avoid them. The purpose is to make the max highscore you can while moving around to not get hit by the enemies.  You can also making use of the power "Time Travel" to get back in time even if you die, but only if you have time energy for this. 

  • Kill enemies and make the best Highscore!
  • Use the Time Travel to back in time, do not die!
  • Control the time in Slow motion!
  • Enemies drop Time Travel flow, pick them!

WASD - Move player
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse - Shoot
E - Slow time
Q - Activates time travel
Mouse Scroll - Controls time travel

*Time has it's own time, so don't wait to Time Travel!

⚠️If you are stuck Press R to reload the stage⚠️


Currently the game for play is a demonstration of the level 0, along with 2 types of the Hazmat people and 4 entities (discover at your own!)

Also,  we are very happy to be participating in the #gamejamplus22. We are know as FourTails, but sadly one member could not participate this time. We love to make new games together and we are making great things. Follow us on (@FourtailsStudios) and over our social media (FourtailsSudios) to get updates from us!   

Programmer: Rodrigo Machado 

Programmer:  Diogo Valadares

2D Artist: Laísa Soares 

We hope you'll enjoy the demo! :)
